attribute.name: monthYearRowClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used on the TR element for the header-row showing month and year.

attribute.name: weekRowClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used on the TR element for the header-row showing the week-days.

attribute.name: dayCellClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the TD element containing a day days.

attribute.name: currentDayCellClass
attribute.description: CSS class to be used for the TD element of the currently selected date.

attribute.name: renderAsPopup
attribute.description: Render the input-calendar as a java-script popup on client.

attribute.name: popupLeft
attribute.description: Render the input-calendar left of the button, not right like normally done.

attribute.name: addResources
attribute.description: Automatically add the input-calendar scripts and css files to the header - set that to false to provide the scripts yourself.

attribute.name: popupDateFormat
attribute.description: Defines the date format used by the java-script popup on client.

attribute.name: popupButtonString
attribute.description: Defines the string displayed on the button which leads to the calendar-popup-window (... by default).

attribute.name: popupButtonStyle
attribute.description: Defines the css style for the button which leads to the calendar-popup-window.

attribute.name: popupButtonStyleClass
attribute.description: Defines the css style class for the button which leads to the calendar-popup-window.

attribute.name: popupGotoString
attribute.description: Set the string for "Go To Current Month"

attribute.name: popupTodayString
attribute.description: Set the string for "Today is"

attribute.name: popupTodayDateFormat
attribute.description: Defines the date format used by the java-script popup on client for the today-is string.

attribute.name: popupWeekString
attribute.description: Set the string for "Wk"

attribute.name: popupScrollLeftMessage
attribute.description: Set the string for scrolling to the left.

attribute.name: popupScrollRightMessage
attribute.description: Set the string for scrolling to the right.

attribute.name: popupSelectMonthMessage
attribute.description: Set the string for "Click to select a month".

attribute.name: popupSelectYearMessage
attribute.description: Set the string for "Click to select a year".

attribute.name: popupSelectDateMessage
attribute.description: Set the string for "Select [date] as date" (do not replace [date], it will be replaced by the current date).

attribute.name: popupTheme
attribute.description:
When styleLocation is not overridden then this selects one of the built-in themes ("WH" or "DB"); the default is "DB".

This also selects the prefix used for the names of style classes attached to generated dom elements; all style names are of form "jscalendar-{popupTheme}-*".

attribute.name: popupButtonImageUrl
attribute.description: Url to the image for this popupButton.

attribute.name: renderPopupButtonAsImage
attribute.description: If true, renders a calendar icon instead of the button to pop up the calendar.

attribute.name: helpText
attribute.description:
A string that will be rendered into the input text field associated with a popup when there is no date currently selected. This string typically describes the expected date format that should be entered into this field (either directly by the user, or by selecting an entry in the popup calendar).

This property has no effect for an inline calendar.

attribute.name: popupSelectMode
attribute.description:
May be "day", "week", "month" or "none":

  • day (default): allow the user to select a day.
  • week: only allow the user to select a week.
  • month: only allow the user to select a month.
  • none: equivalent to "readonly".
